description: With its athletic details and timeless design, The Iconic Rugby Shirt captures the preppy yet sporty sensibility that has long defined the Polo Ralph Lauren brand. This version features all the hallmarks of a traditional rugby shirt—the white point collar, concealed placket, rubber buttons, and ribbed cuffs. Made from durable cotton jersey that stays true to the sport's rough-and-tumble heritage, this shirt will stand up to repeated wear on and off the field of play.
fitting_details: Classic Fit: our roomiest silhouette. Cut for a lower armhole and a fuller sleeve.
Size medium has a 29.5" body length (front and back), an 18.75" shoulder, a 45" chest, and a 35" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Twill rugby collar. Three-button rugby placket. Rubber buttons.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
